flawed_nl_solution:
If Lexie takes 20 minutes to run a mile, Celia takes 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 minutes to run the same distance since she is twice as fast.
Celia takes 10 minutes to run one mile so it will take 10*30 = <<10*30=3000>>3000 minutes to run 30 miles.
#### 3000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
